source: Web Search (ZipRecruiter, Glassdoor, Cursor Directory, Indeed, GoodVibeCode)
search_query: developers using AI coding tools Cursor Copilot Claude Code
notes: Jobs for developers who USE AI coding assistants in their daily work, not AI engineers building AI systems

jobs.company_description: Online legal services platform making law accessible and affordable. Remote-first company headquartered in Glendale, CA.
jobs.description:
Join LegalZoom's engineering team to build and maintain our legal services platform. You'll work on features that help millions of customers navigate legal processes.

Requirements:
- Experience working with agentic tooling (e.g., Cursor, Copilot)
- Strong software engineering fundamentals
- Experience with modern web development
- Ability to ship production code iteratively
jobs.how_youll_be_tested: Technical interview focused on software engineering fundamentals and practical coding. We value developers who leverage AI tools to ship faster.

jobs.company_description: Award-winning Employee Experience platform helping organizations improve employee engagement, retention, and performance.
jobs.location_details: United States (excluding CA, MT, VT, PR)
jobs.description:
Join WorkTango as a Software Engineer I to design, build, and deploy features for our Employee Experience platform.

Responsibilities:
- Design, build, and deploy features working closely with other members of the engineering team
- Work with modern technologies including TypeScript, Node, React, Express, and Postgres
- Advocate for modern software engineering practices such as continuous integration, unit testing, and automated deployments

Requirements:
- Experience using AI coding tools such as Cursor or Claude Code
- Familiarity with TypeScript, Node.js, React
- Experience with agile software development processes such as scrum
- Strong collaboration and communication skills
jobs.how_youll_be_tested: Technical interview covering software engineering fundamentals and your experience using AI coding tools to accelerate development.

jobs.company_description: Building developer tools and automation. Early-stage startup focused on modern development workflows.
jobs.description:
We're seeking a Cursor/Windsurf/Claude-Code/Cline expert to create dotfiles and developer tooling.

- Expert-level proficiency with AI coding tools: Cursor, Windsurf, Claude Code, Cline
- Strong Node.js/TypeScript skills
- React experience
- Python and Ruby knowledge
- AWS experience
- OSS contributions a plus
jobs.how_youll_be_tested: Technical assessment focused on your mastery of AI coding tools. We want to see how you leverage these tools to build faster and better.

jobs.company_description: EdTech platform focused on teaching developers to master AI coding tools and technologies.
jobs.description:
We're looking for a Freelance AI Coding Course Instructor specializing in Claude, Copilot, Cursor, and Replit.

- Create and deliver engaging online courses that empower learners to master AI coding tools
- Develop course content, conduct live sessions, and provide mentorship to students

Requirements:
- Mid-Senior Level professional with expertise in AI programming
- Deep knowledge of Claude, GitHub Copilot, Cursor, and Replit
- Experience creating educational content
- Strong communication and teaching skills
jobs.how_youll_be_tested: Portfolio review of previous educational content and demonstration of AI tool proficiency.

jobs.company_description: B2B SaaS company building workflow automation tools for enterprise clients.
jobs.description:
Join our engineering team to build and scale our workflow automation platform.

We're looking for developers with an AI Native Workflow who are comfortable using AI coding assistants (Cursor, GitHub Copilot, Claude Code, etc.) to accelerate development.

Requirements:
- 5+ years full-stack development experience
- Proficiency with TypeScript, React, Node.js
- Experience with PostgreSQL or similar databases
- Demonstrated experience using AI-powered development tools to ship faster
- Strong problem-solving and communication skills
jobs.how_youll_be_tested: Technical interview with live coding using your preferred AI coding assistant. We want to see how you work, not just what you know.

jobs.company_description: Design-to-code platform helping teams ship beautiful interfaces faster.

jobs.company_description: AI software development company leading the future of autonomous coding. Building self-hosted Cloud Development Environments that enable AI coding agents and human developers to collaborate.

jobs.how_youll_be_tested: Technical interview covering distributed systems and developer tools. We evaluate your ability to build great developer experiences.

jobs.company_description: The world's leading platform for agentic software development — powered by Copilot. Over 180 million developers and 77,000+ organizations use GitHub.
jobs.description:
Join the GitHub Security Products team on a mission to secure the world's software. Build tools that make it easy to find, fix and prevent code vulnerabilities and credential leaks.

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, test and ship high-quality technical solutions at scale
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams on innovative solutions
- Provide technical leadership, mentorship, and code reviews
- Write architecture briefs, carry out code experiments, and build prototypes
- Design and implement APIs for seamless integration
- Utilize CI/CD tools for continuous integration and delivery

Requirements:
- 4+ years software engineering experience
- Production experience with C, C++, C#, JavaScript, Go, Ruby, Rust, or Python
- Strong problem-solving and communication skills
jobs.how_youll_be_tested: Technical interview covering systems design and practical coding. We care about shipping quality code at planetary scale.

jobs.company_description: Microsoft Search, Assistant, and Intelligence (MSAI) team building Microsoft 365 Copilot - a groundbreaking productivity tool leveraging large language models.
jobs.description:
Build the next generation of Microsoft 365 Copilot capabilities. Work on the central infrastructure that powers copilots like Microsoft 365 Chat, Word, and PowerPoint.

The MSAI team is driving one of Microsoft's most transformative technology efforts: bringing large language models to every customer through the Microsoft 365 suite.

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and deliver innovative software applications
- Work on coding, debugging, testing, and troubleshooting
- Work on challenging projects and collaborate with talented colleagues
- Shape the future of technology at Microsoft

Requirements:
- Strong software engineering fundamentals
- Experience with large-scale distributed systems
- Passion for AI and developer productivity tools
jobs.how_youll_be_tested: Technical interview covering systems design and AI/ML concepts. We evaluate your ability to ship impactful products at scale.
